| HistoryText             = 
===Origin===
With an increasing number in the student body, [[Scott Summers (Earth-616)|Cyclops]] & [[Emma Frost (Earth-616)|Emma Frost]] reorganized the [[Xavier's School for Gifted Youngsters|Xavier Institute]]'s educational and training program.{{r|New X-Men Vol 2 #1}} Storm's Squad was advised by [[Ororo Munroe (Earth-616)|Storm]].{{r|Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe A to Z Vol 1 13}}

===Notable Members===
* [[Nezhno Abidemi (Earth-616)|Gentle]] - Nezhno Abidemi possesses extreme strength and is covered in [[Vibranium]] tattoos. He is the only known member of Storm's Squad. Retained his powers and remained with the X-Men, though he was excluded from trying out for the [[New X-Men (Earth-616)|New X-Men]].

===M-Day===
After [[Decimation|M-Day]] only 27 of 182 enrolled Xavier's students retained their mutant powers. Storm's Squad was disbanded along with all the other [[X-Men Training Squads]].{{r|New X-Men Vol 2 #20|#23}}

| Notes                   = 
* Although Storm's Squad certainly had other students, [[Nezhno Abidemi (Earth-616)|Gentle]] was the only student invited to/allowed to attend [[Ororo Munroe (Earth-616)|Storm]]'s marriage to the [[T'Challa (Earth-616)|Black Panther]].{{r|Black Panther Vol 4 18}}
| Trivia                  = 
* Storm's Squad was never seen fully on-panel.
* The real name of Storm's Squad has never been revealed.
